value.title: Azure Friday | DocumentDB Stored Procedures Best Practices
value.excerpt: Andrew Liu joins Scott Hanselman to talk about Azure DocumentDB's language integrated, transactional execution of JavaScript, which enables developers write stored procedures, triggers and user defined functions (UDFs) natively in JavaScript. Andrew also shares best practices for writing these stored

value.title: Azure Friday | Visually build pipelines for Azure Data Factory V2

When you combine the cost savings gained from Azure RIs with the added value of the Azure

value.title: Azure Security Center – Just-in-Time Network Access
value.excerpt: Cloud hosted VM’s are prime targets for RDP and SSH brute force attacks because management ports are typically left in an open state. With Just in Time network access, you can put any of your ports, not just management ports, into a default deny state until a user requires access. Once access is requested,
